sysauto_script.name: Create HealthCheck Integration User

sys_update_version.name: sysauto_script_ff389224477c92509d9f9915126d43f7
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script"> <sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <business_calendar/> <condition/> <conditional>false</conditional> <entered_time>1970-01-01 00:00:00</entered_time> <max_drift/> <name>Create HealthCheck Integration User</name> <offset/> <offset_type>0</offset_type> <run_as display_value="Stefan Popov">15e5b79d93e0d610052ef5cd0bba10d9</run_as> <run_as_tz/> <run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth> <run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek> <run_period/> <run_start>2024-09-19 07:48:04</run_start> <run_time>1970-01-01 08:00:00</run_time> <run_type>daily</run_type> <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user'); gr.addQuery('user_name', 'healthcheck.integration.user'); gr.query();
if(!gr.next()){ var grCreateUser = new GlideRecord('sys_user') grCreateUser.initialize(); grCreateUser.user_name = gs.getProperty('x_nuvo_diag.integration_user_name') grCreateUser.active = true; grCreateUser.user_password = gs.getProperty('x_nuvo_diag.integration_user_password'); var user = grCreateUser.insert(); var grUserHasRole = new GlideRecord('sys_user_has_role'); grUserHasRole.initialize() grUserHasRole.setValue('user',user) grUserHasRole.setValue('role','d62440b193a41a10052ef5cd0bba105c'); grUserHasRole.setValue('state','active'); grUserHasRole.insert() }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>Stefan.Popov@nuvolo.com</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-09-19 08:00:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>ff389224477c92509d9f9915126d43f7</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Create HealthCheck Integration User</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Diagnostic Tool" source="x_nuvo_diag">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Diagnostic Tool">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sysauto_script_ff389224477c92509d9f9915126d43f7</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>Stefan.Popov@nuvolo.com</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-09-19 08:06:40</sys_updated_on> <time_zone/> <upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe> </sysauto_script> </record_update>
